question:
You need to take leave from your work of over one month of a period for personal reasons. Write a letter to your boss. In your letter
· Explain the reason for the leave and the length of leave you need
· Explain how you will keep up-to-date while you’re away
· Suggest how your work could be covered while you are away
text: I am excited and glad to write this letter as I am going to get my marriage on the 3rd of November 2022. Hence I would like to apply for a minimum of one month's leave between 1st to 30th of November to look after my lifetime memories which are crucial and incalculable in everybody's life.

Having said that, I may not be available at the workplace as mentioned above but it doesn't mean that I will ignore the work and go on my vacation completely as we are in a critical phase of the execution which is very close to the milestone achievements. Therefore, I decided to work at night times despite the busy schedules at my place. In addition, I will join on-call and connect with clients if there are any gaps between our meetings.

As you know, I will be in touch with the team to know about the status and clear their doubts. Furthermore, I will run the show during the client meetings and this would help to cover the whole work  update without any issues.
I look forward to seeing your support during my vacation and I will ensure that project will  go live as per the commitment given to them and rest please leave it to me.
